channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 据法新社记者报道，周一基辅市中心发生数次爆炸，乌克兰首都拉响了空袭警报，官员们敦促居民躲避➡️。
item.description:
Several blasts rang out in central Kyiv on Monday, AFP journalists reported, as air raid sirens sounded in the Ukrainian capital and officials urged residents to take shelter ➡️ https://t.co/edoNmOAw6a pic.twitter.com/6mZVMZOdSS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #中国表示支持联合国安理会关于加沙 "立即 "停火的新决议草案
item.description:
#BREAKING China says supports new UN Security Council draft resolution on 'immediate' Gaza ceasefire pic.twitter.com/4Cmk3niRDa

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯瑟琳罹患癌症的消息一经公布，社交媒体上关于她健康状况的各种猜测，包括她已经去世的猜测，引起了人们的反感。但无休止的阴谋论并未停止...
item.description:
Conspiracies linger.

The revelation that Catherine, the Princess of Wales, has cancer prompted a backlash over the torrent of lurid social media speculation around her health, including by those positing she was dead. But the endless churn of conspiracy theories has not stopped… pic.twitter.com/6YDiASUfCY

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 贝尔格莱德一栋被炸毁的建筑是1999年北约袭击塞尔维亚的国家象征，它可能很快会成为唐纳德-特朗普女婿出资建造的豪华酒店，这令塞尔维亚人非常愤怒。
item.description:
VIDEO: Serbians angry at Trump family deal for site of NATO bombing.

A bombed-out building in Belgrade, which has stood as a national symbol of the 1999 NATO strikes on Serbia, might soon become a luxury hotel financed by Donald Trump's son-in-law -- much to the anger of… pic.twitter.com/8D1w1IM6Jg

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #法国内政部长杰拉尔德-达尔马宁（Gerald Darmanin）表示，周一已在全国范围内开展了数次被称为 "XXL 清理行动 "的大规模缉毒突击行动。
item.description:
#BREAKING French Interior Minister Gerald Darmanin says several major anti-drug raids dubbed "XXL cleanup operations" have been launched Monday across the country pic.twitter.com/JUFX6kNmmQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #巴布亚新几内亚北部发生 6.9 级地震，洪水泛滥，官员们周一表示，估计有 1,000 所房屋被毁，救灾人员正在赶往该地区。
item.description:
#BREAKING An estimated 1,000 homes were destroyed after a magnitude 6.9 earthquake rocked flood-stricken northern Papua New Guinea, officials said Monday as disaster crews poured into the region pic.twitter.com/2aOgFoHu8v

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 4月1日，在澳门赛马会从政府获得的赛马经营特许权终止后，这个中国南部的赌场中心的赛马比赛将退出历史舞台。
item.description:
Macau horse racing enters its final furlong.

On April 1, horse racing in the southern Chinese casino hub will be consigned to history after the club's concession from the government to operate racing was terminatedhttps://t.co/cClzJItPti pic.twitter.com/HWwfXrtjsu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 莫斯科音乐厅袭击事件造成 137 人死亡，四名嫌疑人被还押候审，所有四名嫌疑人均被指控犯有恐怖主义罪。
item.description:
Four suspects remanded in custody over Moscow concert hall attack killed 137 people.

All four suspects have been charged with terrorism.

Russia observed a national day of mourning on Sunday following the attack claimed by the Islamic Statehttps://t.co/HC1uZhFT7f pic.twitter.com/PMMPiOPiJw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 加沙遭到轰炸，联合国负责人谴责 "恐怖和饥饿"......要求立即停火并停止以色列派兵进入拉法的计划的呼声日益高涨。
item.description:
Gaza bombed as UN chief decries 'horror and starvation'.

Appeals are growing for an immediate ceasefire and a halt to Israeli plans to send troops into Rafahhttps://t.co/6uNrgMd6yl pic.twitter.com/cadZEzCnyy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: #菲律宾外交部称中国代表因岛礁外的 "侵略行为 "被传唤
item.description:
#BREAKING Philippine foreign ministry says Chinese representative summoned over 'aggressive actions' off reef pic.twitter.com/4o4VirLo8e

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 世界自然基金会（WWF）每年都会举办 "地球一小时 "活动，以提高人们对环境问题和气候变化的认识。
item.description:
VIDEO: Sights around the world go dark to celebrate Earth Hour.

Sights worldwide went dark for one hour to commemorate Earth Hour, an annual event by the World Wildlife Fund (WWF) to raise awareness of environmental issues and climate change pic.twitter.com/3qvqXH8U3p

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 25, 2024

item.title: 周日，数百名围着围裙的服务员在中世纪的街道上奔跑，巴黎市中心的游客在这场独一无二的比赛中大饱眼福。
item.description:
Visitors to central Paris were treated on Sunday to the sight of hundreds of aproned waiters surging through the mediaeval streets, in a one-of-a-kind race designed to show off the profession months ahead of the Olympic Games https://t.co/MBuc2tBpAk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: 巴西警方周日逮捕了三名现任和前任官员，他们涉嫌策划了 2018 年暗杀里约热内卢市议员玛丽埃尔-佛朗哥的行动
item.description:
Brazilian police on Sunday arrested three current and former officials who allegedly masterminded the 2018 assassination of Rio de Janeiro city councilor Marielle Franco https://t.co/htByPxcdwq

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: 塞内加尔总统大选于周日开始计票，这次选举的目的是在数年动荡和政治危机之后保持连续性，反对激进变革。
item.description:
Vote counting got underway Sunday in Senegal's presidential election pitching continuity against radical change following several years of unrest and a political crisis https://t.co/WY94KxCbqn

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: 制造该飞船的公司称，美国一艘未载人着陆器因未能 "苏醒 "而终结了它的使命，该着陆器成为第一艘登上月球的私人飞船。
item.description:
An uncrewed American lander that became the first private spaceship on the Moon has met its ultimate end after failing to "wake up," the company that built it said https://t.co/8RixyvqDnj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: #法国总理表示，"威胁 "发生后，法国提高了安全警戒级别
item.description:
#BREAKING France raises security alert level following 'threats', says PM pic.twitter.com/QML5nXdzMH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: 在棕枝主日，信徒们列队缓缓走过加沙唯一的天主教堂的石头外墙，在周围战火纷飞的时候，他们聚集在一起祈祷和平
item.description:
The faithful walked slowly in a procession past the stone facade of Gaza's only Catholic church on Palm Sunday, gathering to pray for peace as war raged around them https://t.co/k84yvxVNTl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: #法国马克龙警告以色列内塔尼亚胡，强行转移拉法人口可能构成 "战争罪
item.description:
#BREAKING France's Macron warns Israel's Netanyahu that forced Rafah population transfer could be 'war crime' pic.twitter.com/Kslwz8fxQ6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: 三届世界冠军马克斯-维斯塔潘（Max Verstappen）在周日澳大利亚大奖赛中退赛，他的红牛赛车冒出滚滚浓烟，他说感觉就像 "拉着手刹开车 "#AFPSports
item.description:
Three-time world champion Max Verstappen said it felt like driving "with the handbrake on" after retiring from the Australian Grand Prix Sunday with smoke billowing from his Red Bull #AFPSports https://t.co/fETCyCeHxu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: 周日，在莫斯科街头，人们在震惊、悲痛和愤怒中度过了俄罗斯二十年来伤亡最惨重的袭击事件后的全国哀悼日。
item.description:
On the streets of Moscow on Sunday, there was shock, grief and anger as Russia observed a day of national mourning after the deadliest attack in the country for two decades https://t.co/D58Zq0juIx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: #法国表示将为海地弱势公民提供撤离航班
item.description:
#BREAKING France says to offer evacuation flights for vulnerable citizens in Haiti pic.twitter.com/nPZ5X8mVXJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: #莫斯科音乐厅发生大屠杀，造成至少 137 人死亡，这是伊斯兰国圣战组织宣称在欧洲发动的最致命袭击 ➡️。
item.description:
#UPDATE Russia observed a national day of mourning on Sunday after a massacre in a Moscow concert hall killed at least 137 people, the deadliest attack in Europe to have been claimed by the Islamic State jihadist group ➡️ https://t.co/IaAtOvl6sE pic.twitter.com/wvq4BTgytG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇨🇦🇫🇷 加拿大学生在法国追寻士兵祖先的足迹中学生追寻在第二次世界大战诺曼底战役中牺牲的祖先的足迹。共有 90,000 名加拿大人参加了这场战役，其中 5,500 人牺牲。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇨🇦🇫🇷 Canadian students retrace soldier ancestors' steps in France

High school students retrace the footsteps of their ancestors who lost their lives during the Battle of Normandy in World War II. In total, 90,000 Canadians took part in the battle, of whom 5,500 died. pic.twitter.com/DYODlSbfZa

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: 马拉维总统本周末呼吁提供 2 亿美元的粮食援助，称由于与厄尔尼诺天气现象有关的干旱，数百万公民面临饥饿 ➡️
item.description:
Malawi's president appealed for $200 million in food aid this weekend, saying millions of citizens faced starvation due to a drought linked to the El Nino weather phenomenon ➡️ https://t.co/NpUTXab0Uy pic.twitter.com/gPeGnuVhk3

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: 奥利维亚-罗德里戈向粉丝发放紧急避孕药，而非 "堕胎药
item.description:
Olivia Rodrigo gave emergency contraceptives to fans, not 'abortion pills' https://t.co/osQ7iu82QH pic.twitter.com/iXRjfCxGZx

— AFP Fact Check 🔎 (@AFPFactCheck) March 22, 2024

item.title: 视频：🇫🇷 🌍 埃菲尔铁塔为 #EarthHour 而熄灯，巴黎地标纪念这一全球活动。
item.description:
VIDEO: 🇫🇷 🌍 Eiffel Tower goes dark for #EarthHour

The lights went off at the Parisian landmark to mark the global event, usually held every year on the last Saturday in March to raise awareness of climate change and promote energy saving #EarthHour2024 pic.twitter.com/2ChtoXnLVM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024

item.title: TikTok Taoiseach"：西蒙-哈里斯将成为爱尔兰有史以来最年轻的总理，他希望自己的社交媒体技能和新面孔能在大选迫在眉睫之际挽救他所在政党的颓势 ⬇️ ✍️ @MurphyPeterN
item.description:
'TikTok Taoiseach': Simon Harris, set to become Ireland's youngest ever prime minister, will hope his social media skills and fresh face can save his party's flagging fortunes as elections loom ⬇️ https://t.co/VXpUtIVBtX
✍️ @MurphyPeterN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 24, 2024
